function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Gaps in pandemic resilience in global assessment tools (BREEAM, CASBEE, LEED, WELL)","Impact":"Inadequate pandemic resilience in residential buildings, increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Update assessment indicators to include pandemic resilience, integrate health and safety criteria","Technologies":"Data analytics, building performance simulation, indoor air quality monitoring systems","People":"Residential building occupants, public health","Owner":"Certification bodies, building designers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for pandemic-resilient design elements in residential buildings","Impact":"Reduced resilience to epidemics, compromised health and safety of occupants","Mitigation":"Incorporate biophilic design elements into building frameworks, prioritize air and sunlight/daylight in design","Technologies":"Biophilic design principles, green building materials, daylighting systems","People":"Building designers, architects, urban planners","Owner":"Building developers, architects, urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate integration of sustainability and pandemic resilience goals in residential building design","Impact":"Difficulty in achieving sustainable architecture and biophilic design goals, reduced ability to combat climate change and promote health and well-being","Mitigation":"Integrate pandemic-resilient design principles into sustainable architecture frameworks, prioritize nature incorporation and health-promoting features","Technologies":"Sustainable building materials, green infrastructure, renewable energy systems","People":"Architects, designers, environmental engineers","Owner":"Building developers, sustainability organizations"}]}
